thread.title: NOPD: Men who robbed cab driver caught on security camera
thread.title_full: NOPD: Men who robbed cab driver caught on security camera - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: NOPD: Men who robbed cab driver caught on security camera
text:
NEW ORLEANS (WVUE) - New Orleans police need the public's assistance finding two men who might have been involved in the armed robbery of a cab driver.
The incident happened on Wednesday after the cab driver picked up the two perpetrators around 10:55 p.m. in the 2400 block of Tulane Avenue. He drove them to Jennifer Street and Maumus Street.
Once there, one of the passengers pulled out a gun and demanded the driver's money. The victim gave the men $15 before they ran away.
Police describe one man as clean shaven, about 5'10", in his mid-twenties, 170 pounds, and with a tattoo of a cross on his face.
The other man is described as about 5'10", in his early twenties.
Citizens with information that can help solve this crime are asked to call Crimestoppers at 822-1111 or toll-free 1-877-903-STOP. You could receive a cash reward of up to $2,500 for the information leading only to the arrest, except on homicides, where Crimestoppers will pay half of the reward upon the arrest and half on the indictment of the responsible person(s). You do not have to give your name nor testify to receive the reward but you must contact Crimestoppers directly with your information. Citizens can also submit an anonymous tip online to Crimestoppers at www.crimestoppersgno.org .
